name: Omgwp Wordpress Pinboard
overview:
Omgwp the dedicated social press board for wordpress, Omgwp aims to be the first choice when it comes to wordpress and related products like themes, plugins wordpress powered websites etc. We are one of the best source to find the best free and premium wordpress themes or plugins, you can find the best possible wordpress products which suits your need.

For Theme Or Plugin Companies For the companies dealing with wordpress products PinWordpress is a must where you should promote your products to increase your customer base. You can post themes, plugins wordpress powered websites free of cost on PinWordpress portal.

For New Webmasters

If you are planning to create a new website using wordpress, PinWordpress is a must place to visit to find the best possible wordpress themes & plugins for your specific needs.

milestones.description:
Pinwordpress which is the dedicated pinboard for wordpress & related products.
The rebranding came to accommodate the trademark policies of wordpress foundation.
As per the wordpress trademark policies using the word “wordpress” is a trademark violation
milestones.source_description: Pinwordpress has been re branded to omgwp.com
